summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Harry, providing wiring instructions for various checking and savings accounts, as well as brokerage accounts. It includes attachments with account details and emphasizes the need for the documents to be signed and sent to the appropriate person at JPMorgan.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the sender of the email, providing instructions and account details to Harry.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is the recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby, who is instructed to modify and send the wiring instructions.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby, as an associate, is communicating with Harry regarding financial account instructions.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby sent an email with wiring instructions for various accounts.
The email includes multiple attachments related to brokerage and checking accounts.
The instructions are to be modified and sent to the appropriate person at JPMorgan.
